column1: BATTLEAXE:"Battleaxe":"WEAPONMARTL":"1d8":"SLASHING":10.00:4.00::"VERSATILE":"1d10":"Proficiency with a battleaxe allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.":"SRD"

column3: LOADING"::"Proficiency with a blowgun allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.":"SRD"
any creature proficient with the javelin is also proficient with this weapon. On a miss
column4: a boomerang returns to the thrower's hand.":"SRD"

column2: VERSATILE":"1d6":"This weapon is a sickle attached to a heavy iron weight by a length of chain. In some cultures it is known as a kusarigama.  You can use a chain sickle to make an Entangle action
column3: if your DM allows you to use that optional rule.":"SRD"

column2: TWOHANDED"::"The signature weapon of Valenar elves. These blades are strong
column4: and remarkably light. A Valenar blade in the hands of a non-elf is generally assumed to have been stolen or looted from a fallen foe
column5: and a Valenar elf might feel entitled to demand its return or challenge the bearer to prove they're worthy to wield it. **Special:** If you attack with a double-bladed scimitar as part of the Attack action on your turn
column6: you can use a bonus action immediately after to make a melee attack with it. This attack deals 1d4 slashing damage on a hit

SPECIAL"::"Proficiency with a lance allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it. You have disadvantage when you use a lance to attack a target within 5 feet of you. Also
column3: a lance requires two hands to wield when you aren't mounted.":"SRD"

column1: MORNINGSTAR:"Morningstar":"WEAPONMARTL":"1d8":"PIERCING":15.00:4.00::::"Proficiency with a morningstar allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.":"SRD"

column3: THROWN"::"Proficiency with a net allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it. A Large or smaller creature hit by a net is restrained until it is freed. A net has no effect on creatures that are formless
column4: or creatures that are Huge or larger. A creature can use its action to make a DC 10 Strength check
column5: freeing itself or another creature within its reach on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) also frees the creature without harming it
column6: ending the effect and destroying the net. When you use an action
column8: or reaction to attack with a net
column9: you can make only one attack regardless of the number of attacks you can normally make.":"SRD"

column3: TWOHANDED"::"Proficiency with a pike allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.":"SRD"
